## getEchoSrv() function

### getEchoSrv() function

Used to retrieve the [EchoSrv](./runtime/echosrv.md) that can be used to report events to registered echo backends.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function getEchoSrv(): EchoSrv;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { getEchoSrv } from '@grafana/runtime';
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`EchoSrv`
